body.name: CURAD Alcohol Prep Pads (Pack of 4 Boxes) | 400 Pieces of Medium Isopropyl Alcohol Wipes Individually Wrapped | First Aid Alcohol Swabs for Cuts & Scrapes | Medical Alcohol Pads for General Cleansing
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 27 mins
features: INDIVIDUALLY WRAPPED MEDICAL ALCOHOL PADS: Our CURAD Alcohol Prep Pads are individually sealed in easy-to-open foil-lined packets. This keeps them sterile and saturated until you need to use them.
ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL WIPES: We use a formulation of 70% Isopropyl Alcohol for our 2-ply pads. Effectively clean your skin and wipe away dirt and oil without use of soap and water.

CONVENIENT FIRST AID: Simplify your first aid routine with our cleansing swabs. You can use them to treat little cuts and scrapes or to prepare your skin for bandaging, finger pricks, or injections. Perfect to clean your skin before finger pricks or insulin shots.

KEEP YOUR SMALL ITEMS CLEAN: Our sterile alcohol prep pads are great for cleaning little things around your home or office. You can use them to wipe down small items like your phone, glasses, or earphones.
PRACTICAL ESSENTIAL ITEM: Our alcohol swab pads easily tuck away without taking up much space. We recommend keeping several with you in your bag, desk, or car to use when needed.
body.description: Product Description Cuard Alcohol Prep Pads are thick to provide excellent cleansing action. Each alcohol swab is individually sealed for convenience and safety. Made with 70% isopropyl alcohol. 400 alcohol swabs. Manufacturer Contact Information 800-633-5463

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and Essential
reviews.reviewText: The Alcohol Prep Pads with Medium Isopropyl Alcohol Wipes, Individually Wrapped, have become an indispensable component of my first aid kit, offering a quick and effective solution for various sanitization needs. These pads combine convenience, hygiene, and versatility, making them an essential addition to any medical or first aid setup.The individually wrapped design of these alcohol prep pads enhances their practicality and portability. Each pad comes in a sealed packet, ensuring a sterile environment until it is ready for use. This feature is especially valuable for on-the-go situations, providing a hygienic solution when access to water and soap may be limited.The medium-sized wipes are adequately moistened with isopropyl alcohol, providing an efficient and thorough cleaning experience. Whether it's disinfecting a minor wound, preparing the skin for an injection, or sanitizing surfaces in a pinch, these pads prove to be versatile and reliable.The sealed packaging not only ensures the cleanliness of each pad but also prevents evaporation, maintaining the effectiveness of the isopropyl alcohol. The easy-to-tear opening allows for quick access without the need for scissors or additional tools, making them user-friendly in emergency situations.The alcohol prep pads are gentle on the skin while effectively eliminating bacteria and germs. The isopropyl alcohol dries quickly, leaving no residue behind. This feature is especially beneficial for individuals with sensitive skin, ensuring a comfortable experience during application.The affordability of these alcohol prep pads adds to their appeal. The cost-effective nature of the product encourages regular replenishment, making it easy to maintain a well-stocked first aid kit without breaking the bank.In conclusion, the Alcohol Prep Pads with Medium Isopropyl Alcohol Wipes, Individually Wrapped, are a must-have for anyone prioritizing hygiene and first aid preparedness. Their convenient packaging, versatility, and affordability make them a reliable choice for various applications, whether at home, in the car, or during outdoor activities. For quick and efficient sanitization on the go, these alcohol prep pads are a practical and essential solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for cleaning
reviews.reviewText: Great for cleaning earrings backs and wires! Also nice for skin prior to an injection or diabetes testing.Good price for so many and comes packaged well. Easy to use while traveling or to put in a car, first aid kit or purse. You can use them to clean your hands if you can't wash them properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good simple product
reviews.reviewText: These are a good alcohol swab. they are a little small, so handling might be a little awkward. The wipes are nice and thick, allowing to hold a lot of alcohol, so these do not dry out immediately. something that will be good to have in one's first aid kit. Definitely recommend these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick and with lots of alcohol but are small; they don't fold out to a larger size
reviews.reviewText: excellent alcohol pads that are thick and have lots of alcohol but are small. at 5 dollars these are excellent value to at 10 bucks its best to buy the generic ones at walmart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wipe Right: CURAD Alcohol Prep Wipes – Medium Size Marvel!
reviews.reviewText: If sterilizing were an Olympic sport, CURAD Alcohol Prep Wipes would be my gold medalist! As someone who meticulously sterilizes everything from earring backs to makeup applicators, these wipes have become my secret weapon in the battle against unwanted germs.The medium-sized wipes are a perfect fit for various tasks, providing a convenient and effective solution for maintaining cleanliness. It's like having a cleanliness genie in a wipe – just a quick rub, and poof, germs be gone!The bang for your buck is where these wipes truly shine. They're a sterilizing symphony, offering quality and quantity in perfect harmony. The medium size strikes the right balance, ensuring you have enough real estate to tackle different sterilization needs without feeling like you're wiping out your budget.Now, let's talk about the real magic – the wipes dry quickly, leaving no sticky residue behind. It's a squeaky-clean victory that even the toughest germs can't escape. The packaging is a travel-friendly bonus, making these wipes your trusty sidekick in the quest for a germ-free existence.In conclusion, CURAD Alcohol Prep Wipes in medium size are not just wipes; they're the unsung heroes of sterilization. So, wipe right, wipe often, and let these little wonders be your partner in keeping things squeaky clean!

Excelentes toallitas, son pequeñas tal como se indica. Son perfectas para limpiar la pantalla de un teléfono o computadora u otro dispositivo.No es delgada como otras lo que hace que no se sequen tan rapido.
Pleasantly surprised this package showed up at my door even though the tracking still said it supposed to be in Jamaica, NY US. I cannot ask for more considering the bigger picture.

The size is the standard alcohol wipe size, small. But it is of a thicker felt material and filled with alcohol. Unlike some thin ones which dries out quickly, this little pad is able to clean effectively and sufficiently a few items before drying out. My second purchase.
I bought this to clean resin off a 3D printer. They work, but man are they tiny. I’m not sure they are a good value for my purpose. They are meant for small jobs.
